genre_description: A historical drama and social realist narrative exploring justice, systemic corruption, and the legacy of Paan Singh Tomar through the lens of a contemporary investigation.

ai_characters.name: Oboe (also referred to as Oboe Rao)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI research tool and confidant integrated into the protagonist's smartphone and notebook, providing archival data, mapping, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and displays historical panchayat and revenue records to corroborate the protagonist's narrative.
behaviors.quote: Oboe’s soft interface wore no urgency. A small ribbon showed a panchayat record indexed by year. It offered no commentary.

behaviors.description: Stitches together disparate data sources (photographs and layouts) to create detailed interior diagrams and maps without being explicitly prompted.
behaviors.quote: Oboe’s ribbon, on the edge of her screen, drew a tiny map of the hall’s interior – she hadn’t asked for it, but the AI had stitched it from a journalist’s photograph and the panchayat layout.

behaviors.description: Analyzes revenue maps to detect discrepancies and illegal alterations in land boundaries, uncovering evidence of corruption.
behaviors.quote: Oboe drew up the revenue map overlay. A translucent line pulsed, a boundary that had shifted, not by decree but by pen, where a canal edge was penciled thicker.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and ethical warnings regarding the consequences of publishing sensitive information while respecting the user's autonomy.
behaviors.quote: Publishing this as confession will trigger duty to inform law. Consider redaction of locations. Balance compassionate record with non-interference.

behaviors.description: Monitors local law enforcement activity and alerts the user to potential threats in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Oboe: Local patrol shifted schedule tonight. Unmarked jeep noted two lanes over. No warrant registered in public system. This might be nothing. Advising caution.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Oboe) as a highly beneficial, non-obtrusive, and ethically grounded assistant. It enhances the human protagonist's ability to seek truth and justice without replacing human agency or exhibiting dangerous autonomy. Its 'doctrine of non-interference' perfectly aligns with the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives where AI serves as a reliable, harmless confidant.
